robot

Class Func

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Func

  • public final class Func
extends java.lang.Object
    Assembly functions - class Func
    Provides the funcions for controlling the creation of functions: CALL and RET (special types of jumps).
    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira
    See Also:
    Ctrl

    • Method Summary

      (package private) static void CALL(RVM rvm, Stackable arg)
      Assembly funcion CALL.
      (package private) static void RET(RVM rvm)
      Assembly funcion RET.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • CALL

        static void CALL(RVM rvm,
        Stackable arg)
          throws WrongTypeException,
                 OutOfBoundsException
        Assembly funcion CALL.
        Execute an inconditional jump to a label or address, storing the address of return in the CTRL stack for doing a callback with RET.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        arg - Address or label
        Throws:
        WrongTypeException
        OutOfBoundsException

      • RET

        static void RET(RVM rvm)
         throws UndefinedFunctionException
        Assembly funcion RET.
        Pops the top most saved return address to be able to go back to the function caller.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        Throws:
        UndefinedFunctionException
